steps: 1. Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
2. Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
3. Select the 'Save As' option from the dropdown menu.
4. In the 'Save As' dialog box, choose the desired file format from the 'Save as type' dropdown menu.
5. Specify the destination folder where you want to save the converted file.
6. Enter a new name for the converted file in the 'File name' field.
7. Click the 'Save' button to convert and save the file in the selected format.
8. Verify that the file has been successfully converted by checking the saved file in the destination folder.
